name: Tower Defense > Red Rose Rising
description: Tower Defense - Red Rose Rising is the lazy TD you've been waiting for!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.00 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.00 GHz Memory: 1000 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
